body.p:
Monticello 23. Jany 64
E L VanWinkle Esqr
Dear Sir

I send the Commissions back might have known it would have to be done send them soon for ^4^ David Bell & Hiram Bell ^7^ this have all well Small pox in the county Stephen Vaughan on the South fork deed I might before that with look for it to spread his brother came right from him to Lower yesterday to get shroud Some excitement over it still recruiting rapidly will this Battalion be mustered into the United States or State Service if the 1st and they are likely to be ordered off a mutinary will be the result keep them at home if possible our young man have all volunteered with the understanding they were for home defence if otherwise will have a bad effect the news of Judge Bustus death was not unexpected to many But cast a gloom over his friends Jusge Barton Sober for a month now nearly C H Bustus poorly yours J S Sallee
